description: A sample exchange descriptor file with REST enbdpoints using query params

restEndpoints.name: getRestRequestDataTypeInt
restEndpoints.description: A sample REST endpoint using INT request data type with GET method. Expecting one query param named id

restEndpoints.name: getRestRequestDataTypeObject
restEndpoints.description: A sample REST endpoint using INT request data type with GET method. Expecting 2 query param named 'age' and 'city'

restEndpoints.name: getRestRequestDataTypeStringList
restEndpoints.description: A sample REST endpoint using INT request data type with GET method. Expecting one query param named id

restEndpoints.name: deleteRestRequestDataTypeInt
restEndpoints.description: A sample REST endpoint using INT request data type. Expecting single param of primitive type to be passed as url parameter

restEndpoints.name: deleteRestRequestDataTypeIntAsQueryParam
restEndpoints.description: A sample REST endpoint using INT request data type. Expecting single param of primitive type to be passed single query param

restEndpoints.name: deleteRestRequestDataTypeObject
restEndpoints.description: A sample REST endpoint using INT request data type. Expecting one query param named id

restEndpoints.name: putRestRequestDataTypeObject
restEndpoints.description: A sample REST endpoint using OBJECT request data type with PUT method. Expecting no query params as object should be serialized as json in request body when PUT method is used

restEndpoints.name: putRestRequestDataTypeObject
restEndpoints.description: A sample REST endpoint using OBJECT request data type with PUT method. Expecting no query params as object should be serialized as json in request body when PUT method is used

restEndpoints.name: putRestRequestDataTypeObjectUsingDefaultQueryParams
restEndpoints.description: A sample REST endpoint using OBJECT request data type with PUT method. 'in' property set 'QUERY' should cause request to be generated using query params

restEndpoints.name: postRestRequestDataTypeIntListAsQueryParam
restEndpoints.description: A sample REST endpoint using INT_LIST request data type

restEndpoints.name: getRestRequestDataTypeStringImplicit
restEndpoints.description: A sample REST endpoint using INT request data type with GET method. Expecting one query param named id
